text: Translated by @BTSesloMejor
My blood, sweat and tears My last dance too
Take it all away, go
My blood, sweat and tears My cold breath too
Take it all away, go
My blood, sweat, and tears . . . ♪ Kim Namjoon, Kim Seokjin, Min Yoongi, Jung Hoseok, Park Jimin, Kim Taehyung, Jeon Jungkook, BTS ♪
♪ Kim Namjoon, Kim Seokjin, Min Yoongi, Jung Hoseok, Park Jimin, Kim Taehyung, Jeon Jungkook, BTS ♪
My blood, sweat and tears
Even my body, heart and soul
You know that it’s already yours
This is an spell to punish me
Peaches and cream Sweeter than sweet
Chocolate cheeks and chocolate wings
But your wings are devil's wings In front of your sweet is bitter, bitter
Kiss me, even if it hurts Come here, tighten me up until it can’t hurt anymore
Baby, even if I get drunk it’s alright, I’ll now drink you up Deep into my throat, with you as the whiskey
My blood, sweat and tears My last dance too
Take it all away, go
My blood, sweat and tears My cold breath too
Take it all away, go
I want you a lot, a lot a lot, a lot
I want you a lot, a lot a lot, a lot, a lot, a lot
I want you a lot, a lot a lot, a lot
I want you a lot, a lot a lot, a lot, a lot, a lot
It’s fine even if it hurts, tie me up so I can’t escape
Grab me tightly and shake me so I can’t snap out of it
Kiss me on the lips (lips) A secret between just the two of us
I’m deeply addicted to the prison that is you So I can’t serve anyone that’s not you
I drank the Holy Grail that is poisonous Even when I knew it was
My blood, sweat and tears My last dance too
Take it all away, go
My blood, sweat and tears My cold breath too
Take it all away, go
I want you a lot, a lot a lot, a lot
I want you a lot, a lot a lot, a lot, a lot, a lot
I want you a lot, a lot a lot, a lot
I want you a lot, a lot a lot, a lot, a lot, a lot
Please kill me softly
Please cover my eyes with your hand
I can’t even refuse you anyway I can’t longer even run away anymore
You’re too sweet, too sweet Because you’re too sweet!!
My blood, sweat, and tears . . . ♪ Kim Namjoon, Kim Seokjin, Min Yoongi, Jung Hoseok, Park Jimin, Kim Taehyung, Jeon Jungkook, BTS ♪
♪ Kim Namjoon, Kim Seokjin, Min Yoongi, Jung Hoseok, Park Jimin, Kim Taehyung, Jeon Jungkook, BTS ♪
(My blood, sweat, and tears) ♪ Kim Namjoon, Kim Seokjin, Min Yoongi, Jung Hoseok, Park Jimin, Kim Taehyung, Jeon Jungkook, BTS ♪
♪ Kim Namjoon, Kim Seokjin, Min Yoongi, Jung Hoseok, Park Jimin, Kim Taehyung, Jeon Jungkook, BTS ♪
VOTE for "BTS" on M.A.M.A (Mnet Asian Music Awards) They deserve it :)
